description: Try our easy to follow Mediterranean Chicken Gyros  recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mediterranean Chicken Gyros Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 8 chicken tenderloins (can also use 4 chicken breasts )

recipeInstructions.text: Rub the chicken with the MasterFoods Mediterranean Spice Blend.
Put olive oil in a frying pan and turn on the heat. Add chicken to the pan and cook turning occasionally until chicken is completely cooked through. About 8 minutes. Set aside.
Mix together the yoghurt, lemon, dill & garlic.
To serve, warm the pitas, and then fill with chicken, yoghurt dressing, lettuce & cherry tomatoes.
